question: If the President issues Proclamation of emergency at a time when Lok Sabha has been dissolved, what happens to such proclamation?
option1: It cannot be effected till Lok Sabha is constituted again
option2: It can be effected with approval from Rajya Sabha
option3: It can be effected with approval of Vice President
option4: President cannot issue proclamation of emergency when Lok Sabha is dissolved
answer: It can be effected with approval from Rajya Sabha
explanation: When National emergency is proclaimed in such a case, Rajya Sabha needs to approve it first.Then whenever Lok Sabha constitutes, it has to pass the resolution for the same within 30 days from its first meeting.
